DOC.brief_title: Study AMG 706 Subjects With Advanced Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumors ( GISTs )
DOC.detailed_description: Expanded Access : Amgen provide expanded access clinical trial . Contact Amgen Call Center ( 866-572-6436 ) information .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Age ≥ 18 year ; Disease progression per Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ( RECIST ) previous treatment imatinib mesylate least 600 mg daily least 8 week , per two independently assess prestudy computerize tomography ( CT ) scan ; Presence least one measurable ( per RECIST ) Progressing tumor lesion previously treat radiotherapy embolization evaluable CT scan magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) ; Karnofsky performance status ≥ 60 ; imatinib treatment terminate least 7 day study day 1 ; Adequate hepatic , renal , cardiac function . Exclusion criterion : Prior malignancy ( GIST , situ cervical cancer , basal cell cancer skin ) unless treat curative intent without evidence disease ≥ 3 year ; cardiac disease include myocardial infarction , unstable angina , congestive heart failure ( New York Heart Association class > II ) , uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic > 145 mmHg diastolic > 85 mmHg ) , History arterial thrombosis deep vein thrombosis ( include pulmonary embolus ) within 1 year study day 1 ; Absolute neutrophil count < 1.5x109/L , platelet count < 100x109/L , hemoglobin < 9.0 g/dL ; Prior treatment motesanib diphosphate KIT ( except imatinib ) VEGF inhibitor . The study approve institutional review board participate institution , patient provide write informed consent studyrelated procedure perform .
